description: Numbers n such that concatenation of numbers from 1 to n is a semiprime.
comments: From _Sean A. Irvine_, Apr 15 2010, updated Oct 8 2015: (Start)5053 and 9706 are definite members of the sequence.The next potential member is 1651.A007908(1651) is composite, but has no known prime factor, and its least prime factor likely has at least 45 digits. (End)
links: P. De Geest, Normal Smarandache Concatenated Numbers, Prime factors from 1 up to n
M. Fleuren, Factors and primes of Smarandache sequences.
M. Fleuren, Smarandache Factors and Reverse factors
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Aug 15 1998.
extensions: Simplified definition by _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 29 2010
